name: Ill Horizon
description:
The world is gone. Diseases are rampant, cities are ruined, and monsters are born. There are few survivors, clinging on to hope. 

Ill Horizon is all about exploration and survival. There are countless secrets to discover, many powerful monsters to overcome, and amazing weapons/armor to craft. Everyone’s skills will be unique, and powering your characters up before battles will be essential. Battles are quick; bump into an enemy, and watch who will emerge victorious. Manage your resources wisely, and keep your characters alive. This game features entirely custom assets, from graphics to music.
